conversion_software_linkage.table_comment: Linkage table keeping conversion software setting id groupings in line. These IDs are used to link tables conversion_software_settings and samples. This must be incremented prior to adding new rows in conversion_software_settings, and the new ID used in both conversion_software_settings(id) and samples(software_conversion_settings_id).
conversion_software_linkage.name: id
conversion_software_linkage.field_comments: automatically populated with each call to keep settings together
